current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Providing for a conditional adjournment or
		  recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was considered and agreed to

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SCON 44 ATS: Providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.
